title: Specialized S-Works Ares 2 Shoes Review: Incredible but There’s a Catch
content:
The Specialized S-Works Ares 2 is wider, looks better, claims a wild 7-watt advantage, and should last longer but there’s a price to pay.

Read the full article at Specialized S-Works Ares 2 Shoes Review: Incredible but There’s a Catch on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
